should have rejoin committee signs , rejoin the composition of an academic authority that committee is some of sainted , student authority can not be so good be slipshod in work !要有答辩委员会签字，答辩委员会都是些德高望重的学术权威组成，学生权威可不是那么好糊弄的！

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'reply to a charge or pleading in a lawsuit'): from Old French rejoindre, from re- 'again' + joindre 'to join'

entry.def: If you rejoin a group, club, or organization, you become a member of it again after not being a member for a period of time.

example.ex: The Prime Minister of Fiji has said Fiji is in no hurry to rejoin the Commonwealth...
example.tran: 斐济总理称斐济并不急于重返共同体。

example.ex: He rejoined Sadler's Wells Royal Ballet as Assistant Administrator in 1988.
example.tran: 他在1988年重回萨德勒的威尔斯皇家芭蕾舞团，任行政助理。

entry.def: If you rejoin someone, you go back to them after a short time away from them.

example.ex: Mimi and her family went off to Tunisia to rejoin her father.
example.tran: 米米和她的家人前往突尼斯与父亲团聚。

entry.def: If you rejoin a route, you go back to it after travelling along a different route for a time.

example.ex: At Dorset Wharf go left to rejoin the river...
example.tran: 在多塞特码头向左返回河道。

example.ex: In the morning I rejoined Highway 127 south.
example.tran: 早上我重新回到了127号公路的南端。

entry.def: To rejoin means to answer quickly what someone has said, usually in a clever or critical manner.

example.ex: 'I dare say they do,' rejoined his wife drily. 'And who's to say who's right?'
example.tran: “我敢说他们就是那样，”他的妻子冷淡地回答，“谁又能说谁是对的呢？”

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补

sentences.en: They hastened to Kobe to rejoin the ship.
sentences.cn: 他们赶到神户,返回船上。

sentences.en: Henry has apologized for his bad behaviour and should be allowed to rejoin the group with a clean sheet.
sentences.cn: 亨利对他过去的不端行为表示歉意,如果今后不再重犯错误,应该被允许重新加入这个小组。
